description: Application for a Non Material Minor Amendment of Planning Permission Reference P2017/2822/FUL dated 22 February 2018 to amend Condition 2 (Approved Plans List). The non-material minor amendments sought include reduction in the size of rooflights, omissions of doors and door amendments, additional louvre requirement, window and door location alterations, additional brickwork and window reconfigurations.
decision_conditions:
The decision confirms the Council's agreement to the following alternative wording for condition 2 of planning permission P2017/2822/FUL:

CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:

Drawing Nos. 54V002-HAV-00-ZZ-DR-A-PL-0100 - OS Location Plan; 54V002-HAV-00-ZZDR-A-PL-0101 - Existing Site Plan; 54V002-HAV-00-ZZ-DR-A-PL-0102 - Proposed Site Plan; 54V002-HAV-00-00-DR-A-PL-0200 Rev P01 - GA Plan - Level 00; 54V002-HAV-00-01-DR-APL-
0201 Rev P01 - GA Plan - Level 01; 54V002-HAV-00-02-DR-A-PL-0202 Rev P01 - GA
Plan - Level 02; 54V002-ECO-00-ZZ-DR-A-0744 Rev P6 - GA Plan - Level 03 (Roof);
54V002-HAV-00-ZZ-DR-A-PL-3000 - Typical Window Details; 54V002-HAV-00-ZZ-DR-A-PL- 0600 Rev P02 - Existing Context Sections; 54V002-HAV-00-ZZ-DR-A-PL-0601 Rev P02 - Context Sections; 54V002-HAV-00-ZZ-DR-A-PL-0603 Rev P02 - GA Sections; 54V002-HAV- 00-EL-DR-A-PL-0700 Rev P07 - Elevations - South; 54V002-HAV-00-EL-DR-A-PL-0701 Rev P07 - Elevations - East, West and North; 54V002-FAB-00-DRG-L-0001 Rev P03 - Landscape Colour Masterplan; 54V002-FAB-00-DRG-L-0200 Rev P03 - Hard Landscape General Arrangement Plan; 54V002-FAB-00-DRG-L-0600 Rev P03 - Indicative Levels Plan; 54V002-
FAB-00-DRG-L-0400 Rev P03 - Landscape Site Sections; 54V002-FAB-00-DRG-L-0220 Rev P03 - Proposed Boundaries and Fencing Plan; 54V002-FAB-00-DRG-L-0300 Rev P03 - Soft Landscape General Arrangement Plan; 54V002-AG-EX-XX-DR-E-2401 Rev P01 - External
Lighting; 54V002-AG-EX-XX-DR-ME-4001 Rev P02 - M and E External Services; 54V002-AGEX- XX-DR-ME-4002 Rev P01 - Emergency Lighting; L170119-301 Rev D - Temporary School Drawing; and 1118_SK059 - Window and Elevation Components Diagram; Planning Statement
dated July 2017 prepared by CBRE; Design and Access Statement (including Statement of Community Involvement) (Ref: 1118 Rev D) dated 17 July 2017 prepared by Haverstock; Transport Statement (Ref: 64349 Rev 01) dated 13 July 2017 prepared by Curtins; Interim
Travel Plan (Ref: 64349 Rev 01) dated 13 July 2017 prepared by Curtins; Preliminary Ecological Appraisal (Ref: 775194-REP-ENV-001 Rev 2) dated 13 July 2017 prepared by MLM; Pre-Construction Health and Safety Plan (Ref: 54V002) dated June 2017 prepared by Morgan Sindall; Energy Assessment Rev P03 dated 02 November 2017 prepared by Anderson
Green; EFA Climate Based Daylight Assessment Rev P03 dated 14 July 2017 prepared by
Anderson Green; Building regulations Part L and EPC Report Rev P03 dated 14 July 2017 prepared by Anderson Green; Adaptive Comfort and Indoor Air Quality Assessment Rev P01 dated 14 July 2017 prepared by Anderson Green; Environmental Noise Assessment (Ref:
17/0137/R2 1st Issue) dated 30 June 2017 prepared by Cole Jarman; Daylight and Sunlight Assessment Rev 03 dated 17 July 2017 prepared by KJ Tait Engineers; Health Impact Assessment Screening Document; Heritage Impact Assessment dated July 2017 prepared by
Portico Heritage; Arboricultural Impact Assessment dated 17 October 2017 prepared by ATCoombes; Air Quality Assessment (Ref: 14338AQ-T02 Revision I) dated 13 July prepared by SRL; Air Quality Audit (Ref: 14338AQ-A02 Revision I) dated 13 July prepared by SRL; and
Flood Risk Assessment and Surface Water Drainage Strategy (Ref: 618530-MLM-ZZ-XX-RP-C-0001) Rev 00 dated 19 June 2017 prepared by MLM Group.

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
